description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Danish, Dutch, Polish, Russian.  LEGO® Marvel™ Super Heroes features an original story crossing the entire Marvel Universe. Players take control of Iron Man, Spider-Man, the Hulk, Captain America, Wolverine and many more Marvel characters as they unite to stop Loki and a host of other Marvel villains from assembling a super-weapon capable of destroying the world.
description.short: LEGO® Marvel™ Super Heroes features an original story crossing the entire Marvel Universe.

media.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
media.edition: Original, Bundled with Marvel Animation 2013 Bonus Disc
